sentences.en: John popped his head round the dour.
sentences.cn: 约翰突然把头转向了门.

sentences.en: No wonder he looked so dour.
sentences.cn: 难怪他看上去如此严厉。

sentences.en: Once dour Belfast had been transformed.
sentences.cn: 一度死气沉沉的贝尔法斯特已大为改观.

sentences.en: The city, drab and dour by day, is transformed at night.
sentences.cn: 这座城市白天死气沉沉、单调乏味，晚上就完全变了样。

sentences.en: The goods are priced out dour reach.
The person you are addressing is rather dour and matter - of - fact.
sentences.cn: 与你联系的人相当顽固并一副公事公办的姿态.

sentences.en: They were exposed to dour resistance.
sentences.cn: 他们遭受到顽强的抵抗.

sentences.en: When it comes to more mainstream services, staff are dour and unhelpful.
sentences.cn: 当谈到更多的主流业务, 员工是无生气且无用的.

words.tran_cn: 严厉地；阴郁地；闷闷不乐地
严厉的；顽强的；阴沉的；不爱讲话的

trans.tran_cn: 严厉的，阴沉的，（岩石）嶙峋的，顽强不屈
